properties.title: Maven OS X Application Bundle plugin changelog
properties.author: Eirik Bjorsnos

release.action: dictionaryFile must now be absolute, like this: ${basedir}/src/resources/Info.plist.template.
Added vmOptions parameter that can be used to give parameters to the JVM.
Use plexus-mainclass-finder to automatically find a main class if none is configured.
Ability to add custom classpath elements.
Upgrade to Mojo parent pom 16 that includes site template.
